author.name: TJ Maynes
author.description: TJ Maynes is a Senior Software Developer living in Brooklyn, New York. Interested in personal growth, software development, and automation. Currently, consulting and pairing at VMware Pivotal Labs (all opinions are my own). You can find me on Twitter and LinkedIn.
